item.title: Trump says it is 'such an honor' that Vatican elected first U.S. pope
item.description: Robert Francis Prevost took the papal name Leo XIV after his election as the first American-born pope in the history of the Roman Catholic Church.

item.title: Crypto regulation bill fails to advance in the Senate
item.description: Several Democrats who previously voted for the bill abruptly backed out, but the final vote wasn't close to the 60 needed to advance.

item.title: Robert Prevost is first American pope: Leo XIV
item.description: Robert Francis Prevost succeeds Pope Francis. Pope Leo spent much of his ministry in Peru, and only was made a cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church i...

item.title: Trump says a rate cut would be like 'jet fuel' for markets, but Powell doesn't want to do it
item.description: The Fed on Wednesday voted to keep its benchmark interest rate in a range of 4.25% to 4.5%, where it's kept it on hold since December.

item.title: Trump unveils United Kingdom trade deal, first since 'reciprocal' tariff pause
item.description: President Trump imposed "reciprocal" tariffs on nearly all other countries, but quickly paused them to allow time to negotiate trade agreements with t...
